entry.title: Yellow Paper Daisy
entry.summary:
Author: Babysterek

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 66,140Chapters: 21/25Kudos: 150

Summary: ‚ÄúWell,‚Äù Peter says at last, forcing a crooked smile into his voice, ‚Äúat least this time he didn‚Äôt almost get us all killed.‚ÄùDerek swallows. His throat is dry, the words scraping on the way out. ‚ÄúI was drunk.‚Äù They land and disappear without effect.Talia turns then, her gaze settling on him fully. It‚Äôs steady, unreadable, and it makes his shoulders tense despite himself. ‚ÄúYou were careless,‚Äù she says. ‚ÄúYou are a werewolf, and if you got drunk, you laced it with wolfsbane, you did it. Do you understand, In twenty-four years, every scandal has had the same root. You. At some point, it stops being bad luck and becomes character. And I am tired of pretending this is something that merely happens to you.‚Äù---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Derek just wanted a moment of quiet. Instead, he crosses a line with the last person he should trust.....old grudges, bad decisions and a mistake he keeps repeating. entry.title: Do You Blame Yourself?
entry.summary:
Author: Andromeda_9000

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,281Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 15

Summary: ‚ÄúStiles.‚ÄùHe sprung awake with a choked gasp as his hand flew to his chest, directly over his pounding heart. He blinks unseeingly around the dark room, head throbbing and mouth dry. So‚Ä¶ so dry. His forehead was clammy with sweat as he dragged the back of his hand across it and his feet swung over the side of the bed before he was fully aware. The ground seems to rock under him, spots dotting his vision.----(OR; Stiles is hospitalized after the effects of the Nogitsune and has a panic attack/nightmare while asleep)
